body_html:
hi @rongjiecomputer, Thanks for reply
I tried add bazel build --conlyopt=-std=c99, but C++ compilation problem still occurs. :(

[root@Jingfeng_redhat tensorflow]# bazel build --config=opt --config=cuda --conlyopt=-std=c99 //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
